Package maze.logic

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DragonObject
    DragonObject.java - a class for representing a Dragon that moves by itself.
    GameObject
    GameObject.java - A class for representing a generic object in the Maze.
    HeroObject  
    Maze
    Maze.java - A class for representing the Maze matrix and its objects.
    MazeBuilder
    MazeBuilder.java - A class for building Mazes upon giving a 2D array of chars.
    MazeGame
    MazeGame.java - A class for representing the game of the maze.
    ObjectIOMove
    ObjectIOMove.java - An abstract class for representing an object that moves by the user input
    ObjectSelfMove
    ObjectSelfMove.java - a class for representing an object that moves by itself
